notice_0.subject: UTURN180 Course Completion Deadline is TONIGHT at 11:59PM â€“ Please complete your course as soon as possible
notice_0.body:
Based upon the deadline chosen during registration, your account access will expire TONIGHT at 11:59PM.

If you have questions, need technical assistance or need to change your deadline date, please email us at:
support@uturn180.com

Please include your first and last name along with the question, technical issue or the correct deadline date.

Thank You!
UTURN180 Online Customer Support Team
